thread.title: Tyler Shawn Robinson
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Tyler Shawn Robinson

author: Tyler Shawn Robinson
title: Tyler Shawn Robinson
text:
LTB is great. I specifically needed assistance and was quickly emailed back by Andrew. The customer service is great. And Andrew is great at quick replys and accommodation of the customers needs. Thank you to everyone at LTB. I've have been a customer for almost a year. I love all your videos and Facebook posts. And I catch a lot of big fish 5+ pounders with all the great lure!
One thing, yall should start adding fishing line to the boxes!!!! üëç anyway shout out to Andrew !
